definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers

sentences.english: Why do they go after Mumbai?
d. United Nations Special Rapporteur on the Right to Health, Mumbai, India.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國健康權特別報告員，印度孟買。

sentences.english: He is expected to visit the Taj Mahal, 22, visited India's financial hub Mumbai.
sentences.chinese: 他預計22日參觀泰姬陵，訪問印度金融中心孟買。

sentences.english: For residents of Mumbai, TV coverage was riveting.
sentences.chinese: 在孟買，電視信號被切斷。

sentences.english: One was lost right here in Bombay.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個，剛好是在這兒孟買丟的。

sentences.english: Mumbai police point the finger at 38 individuals, 35 of whom are yet to be apprehended.
sentences.chinese: 孟買警方指出38人中35人將被扣押。

sentences.english: Lying in a den in Bombay , with a slack jaw and not much to say.
sentences.chinese: 躺在孟買的一個密室裏，下巴都懶得動，不想說什麼。

sentences.english: Mumbai celebrating Lord Ganesh Festival in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 印度孟買在2008年的象神節慶祝。

sentences.english: He outsourced the computer department and online customer service to Mumbai and Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 他將電腦部和在線客服業務外包給孟買和班加羅爾。

sentences.english: To see it, Behl and I drove out of Aurangabad, a provincial city east of Mumbai.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾與我從孟買東方的省城奧藍加巴德開車前來觀賞。

sentences.english: But Ratti Bai, why did you come to Bombay to earn money?
sentences.chinese: 可是，拉蒂巴姨，爲什麼是你來孟買掙錢呢？

sentences.english: Mumbai, once known asBombay, is India’s most cosmopolitan city, with a metropolitan area of roughly20 million people.
sentences.chinese: 孟買是印度最大的都市，整個城市人口大約兩千萬。

sentences.english: Most offices were closed, along with the Bombay Stock Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的辦公室都關了門，孟買證券交易所也不例外。

sentences.english: The thirty-second day out of Bombay began inauspiciously.
sentences.chinese: 離開孟買的第三十二天就開始就出現了不詳之兆。

sentences.english: Mumbai's globalized class hungers for it to be a world city.
sentences.chinese: 孟買的全球化階層渴望這裏成爲世界級都市。

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Dhaka, capital of Bangladesh/(Tw) Dakar, capital of Senegal
